title: Full Stack Technical Lead

ambitionBoxData.Title: Sureify Labs Technology Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
We are looking for a Full Stack Technical Lead who is highly experienced in developing web applications that cover the entire development cycle. Able to guide/mentor the team in the most scalable technical architecture and provide hands-on solutions to drive the team. Closely work with the product team and manage the end to end cycle of the development cycle from ideation to deployment,You will have the opportunity to help our product scale and be involved in the further architecture of the Sureify platform.


Responsibilities

Build scalable architecture to support millions of users

Build reusable patterns and libraries for future use

Ability to conceptualise a given problem, plan and implement a solution

Identifying risks and forming contingency plans as soon as possible

Keeping up-to-date with industry trends and developments

Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs

Motivate team members to learn the required skills and stay up tp date on the execution Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability.


Skills And Qualifications

  • 7+ years of experience with Full Stack web development
  • Experience designing and building scalable, enterprise-grade applications Must have experience in any one backend technology i.e Golang/PHP/Node JS Must have experience in pure Javascript
  • Must have experience in any one JS framework like React/Angular/Vue JS etc
  • Experience with Typescript will be added advantage
  • Experience working with relational databases such as MySQL, Oracle or Postgres
  • A firm understanding of Object Oriented Design as well as common data structures and algorithms
  • Strong communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively in a close-knit team Experience with building restful JSON web services
  • Experience in the temporal framework is an added advantage.
  • Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
  • Experience working with 3rd party software integrations (REST APIs, SOAP APIs, XML, JSon, etc.)
  • Experience building secure and scalable software (Profilers, APM tools, Security scanning tools)
  • Experience with CI/CD tooling
  • Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX. Use test driven development and acceptance tests to ensure feature quality Knowledge of API's, such as twitter, Facebook, Google maps, Instagram, etc.

Benefits

Here is a glimpse of some of the benefits we offer:

Competitive Salary

Medical insurance & Accidental insurance to keep you and your family healthy.

Great team to work with exposure to the best technologies in the industry.

title: Technical Architect
tagsAndSkills: Saas / Paas,SDLC,Client Management,Solution Architecting,Fullstack Development,IT Skills,Java,Python
jobDescription:
Around 10+ years of overall experience in developing and testing highly scalable software.


  • Expertise in designing and implementing complex solutions which is scalable and maintainable in long run
  • Sound knowledge in Front end (Angular/React) and Back end (Python/PHP/Node/Java) technologies
  • Experience in deploying application considering the Resilience
  • Ability to guide developers in implementing new solutions or technologies
  • Willingness to learn new technologies, lead POC and suggest solutions
  • Experience in design and developing SOA, Micro Services and Hybrid Monolithic architectures.
  • Knowledge in DevOps pipeline using Onprem and cloud
  • Implementing Code quality assurance tools and techniques
  • Extensive knowledge and experience in reactive architecture.
  • Adequate experience in highly scalable and load bearing end to end applications development
  • Experience in synchronous, asynchronous, event driven based service communication.
  • Experience in distributed, centralized, nosql, sql, and graph based database designing.
  • Experience Domain driven development, test driven development and behavior driven development.
  • Experience in CQRS and CQS
  • Experience in Containers technologies and its orchestration
  • Knowledge of data transformation tools and frameworks.
  • Experience in scaling a monolithic application to micro services.
  • GCP, AWS, Azure and related technologies.
  • Implementing SSO and identity manager solutions
  • PAAS and SAAS products development.
  • HLD, LLD, DLD, SAD documentation.
  • Experience with software development lifecycle (SDLC) processes
  • Should be able to analyse the systems and share the estimates based on the suggested architecture and technologies.

Candidate Profile:

  • Bachelor's Degree in Engineering OR Equivalent with 10+ years of IT Software Service Industry experience
  • A track record of performance excellence meeting and exceeding targets and objectives
  • Experience developing and executing tactical plans for lead generation, and appointment fixing.
  • Respectful and outstanding account management and communication skills
  • Strong command in Selling Solutions and managing multiple clients

title: Engineer / Senior Engineer- CMS/Wordpress (Full stack PHP+ Frontend)
jobDescription:
Forbes Advisor is a new initiative for consumers under the Forbes Marketplace umbrella that provides journalist- and expert-written insights, news and reviews on all things personal finance, health, business, and everyday life decisions.

We do this by providing consumers with the knowledge and research they need to make informed decisions they can feel confident in, so they can get back to doing the things they care about most.


Forbes Advisor is having multiple openings for these roles- Senior Engineer / Associate Lead/ Tech Lead / Architect etc. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in building large scale distributed systems & products.


If you're looking for challenges and opportunities similar to those of a startup, with the benefits of a seasoned and successful company, then read on:


Responsibilities:

  • Work with Engineering managers to understand requirements from them and design and implement solutions.
  • Key and active member in managing all content-related activities for projects, especially CMS-based web builds and updates
  • Responsible for documenting and communicating application design, topologies, and architecture in an understandable way to peers and the business
  • You excel working with User Experience, Product Management, Engineering and Marketing to achieve great web experiences
  • Partner with Engineering & Other Teams on new frameworks, feature sets and functionality
  • Lead and coach team members toward thought leadership and project excellence
  • Provide technical leadership to team members and be a team player.
  • Obsessed with best software engineering practices such as TDD, continuous integration, delivery, and deployment and implementing them

Requirements:

  • Must have a Bachelors degree in computer science or equivalent
  • 3+ years of experience using CMS (Content management system) and development experience.
  • Experience with web applications and programming languages such as PHP, Javascript , HTML, CSS, Bootstrap etc
  • Candidates should have good knowledge in API Integration, Coding, Wordpress Plugin, Customisation, themes. Also should have Hosted Websites.
  • Experience with UI, cross-browser compatibility, general web functions
  • Understand digital data layer and concepts of dynamic web pages
  • Experience with Agile scrum methodologies and JIRA preferred

Technology Experience (Required) :

  • Backend: PHP (Must)
  • Front - End: React/ Next Js / AngularJS or similar and other Web technologies
  • Cloud: Amazon AWS/ Google Cloud
  • Data Stores: Postgres/MongoDB/Dynamodb etc
  • ElasticSearch, Redis or similar caching and search frameworks
  • System Security, Scalability, System Performance experience
  • CICD : Kubernetes/ Terraforms/ Ansible/ Jenkins or similar

Perks:

  • Fully stocked pantry
  • Gaming area with table tennis, pool, and carom tables
  • Amphitheatre for screening sports events, movies, and town halls
  • Paid paternity and maternity leaves
  • Day off on the 3rd Friday of every month

title: Senior Full Stack Java Developer
jobDescription:
DivIni (www.divinisoft.com) is looking for a Senior Full Stack Java Developer who can work on challenging projects for our premium US based client.


We are looking for a dynamic and motivated individual, who can successfully deliver the solution independently. We have challenging work, believe in motivating each other and in having a great team.


Requirements


* Requires a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar

* Around 3-8 years of real-world experience developing enterprise software applications

* Strong Programming skills in Java

* Experience with REST based web services

* Experience with Spring Boot and ORM frameworks like Hibernate

* Experience developing HTML5 web applications (ReactJS or any one of Angular/VueJS)

* Experience working with Relational Databases (SQLServer, Oracle, MySQL etc.,)

* Significant experience in the design and implementation of complex systems

* Strong written and verbal communication skills are a must

* Familiar with standard concepts, practices, and procedures within the software development industry

* Ability to work with large and complex data sets


Duties


* Design and develop highly scalable REST based services

* Design data model, DAO's to talk to database and develop backend code

* Develop front-end HTML5 UI using ReactJS

* Review code developed by other team members

* Assist in the estimation of product development efforts

* Follow development processes, coding standards, and methodologies

* Resolve technical issues through debugging, research, and investigation

* Perform a variety of tasks, and adapts to working on code which is unfamiliar

* Creative ideas are suggested to solve problems

* Professional communication skills are utilized, and made a primary focus


Additional preferred skills


* Experience with cloud based systems (Azure, AWS etc.,)

* Experience with Docker

* Experience working with Unix/Linux systems

* Experience with Maven

* Experience using Git

* Exposure to SCRUM or other agile development processes.

* Eclipse IDE

* Experience in the Financial Services industry a plus

* Experience with a variety of testing tools

* Experience leveraging open-source tools and technologies


Compensation includes a competitive salary commensurate with experience.

title: Sr Engineer / Tech Lead - Radar SW
tagsAndSkills: Radar SW stack,Automotive SW development,RADAR algorithm,IT Skills,Machine Learning,c++,c,Adas
jobDescription:
Job Description

The job involves design and development of Automotive embedded Software used for RADAR data capture pipeline and Radar Data processing. The Job includes

  • Leads and Architects the SW needs for RADAR data processing
  • Analyse the customer requirements to come up with SW design for ADAS application
  • Design and Development of RADAR algorithms, configure, optimize into automotive embedded platforms
  • ASPICE/Functional safety process compliance

Required Skills

  • 2 to 5 years of hands-on Automotive SW development experience with C and C++.
  • Complete Understanding of Radar SW stack
  • Must have exposure and development experience in RADAR signal processing algorithms- Detection, Tracking and Beam forming etc.,
  • Should be very good in DSP fundamentals.
  • Strong Mathematical and Algorithm Development Skills
  • Educational Qualification: BE/BS in CS or EE is required, Mtech/MS is preferred

Preferred Skills

  • MATLAB/ Research experience
  • Experience in ADAS or related areas
  • Understanding of principles of other sensors like camera and LIDAR
  • Basic Understanding of AI and Machine Learning
  • Understanding of sensor calibration
